text: Kremenchuk (; ) is a city in Poltava Oblast (province) of central Ukraine. It is the administrative centre of Kremenchuk Raion (district). It is an important industrial city and 219,022 people lived here in 2020. Although not as large as some other oblast centers and cities of regional significance, Kremenchuk has importance as a large industrial center in Ukraine and Eastern Europe. Category:Cities in Poltava Oblast
title: Kremenchuk
